dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. In: Novus orbis regionum ac insularum veteribus incognitarum, unà cum tabula cosmographica. Edited by Simon Grynaeus from materials collected by Joannes Huttichius. Map is listed on title page verso: In tabulam cosmographiae introductio per Sebastianum Munsterum.
